sys_sg_write_back_action_item.description: Action Item for allowing editing of current Issue
sys_sg_write_back_action_item.name: Edit Issue AI
sys_sg_write_back_action_item.template: issue_due_date={{Due Date}}^impact={{Impact}}^issue_classification={{Issue Classification}}^issue_type={{Issue Type}}^opened={{Opened}}^planned_start_date={{Planned Start Date}}^planned_completion_date={{Planned Completion Date}}^priority={{Priority}}^state={{State}}^short_description={{Short Description}}^choice_template={{Choice Template}}^assigned_to={{Assigned To}}^security_restriction={{Security Restriction}}^EQ
